meanings.definition: Except on the condition that; except under the circumstances that.
meanings.sent1: I won't go outside unless it stops raining.
meanings.sent2: I will stay home unless you come with me.
meanings.sent3: I can't play unless the sun decides to shine!
meanings.sent4: Life feels dull unless there's a bit of excitement.
meanings.sent5: Remember to wear a coat unless it's warm outside.

meanings.sent1: I will eat the cake unless you want it.
meanings.sent2: I'll be quiet unless you ask me a question.
meanings.sent3: I won't be late unless my alarm clock fails me.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lights up the room unless she's upset.
meanings.sent5: I'll be there on time unless something unexpected happens.
